acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

completeWithdrawAccount(uint256).details: User must have previously called `requestWithdrawAccount()` and waited for the cooldown to elapse.

params.manager: The address of the manager for the new subAccount

deregisterSessionKey(address).details: Expires the sessionKey after the cooldown.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

registerSessionKey(address,uint256).details: Registered address gains owner address permission to the subAccount until expiry.

params.expiry: When the access to the owner address expires

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

completeWithdrawAccount(uint256).notice: Allows a user to complete their exit from the Matching system. Can be called by anyone on withdrawable accounts.

createSubAccount(address).notice: Allows user to open an account by creating a new subAccount NFT.

depositSubAccount(uint256).notice: Allows user to open an account by transferring their account NFT to this contract.

depositSubAccountFor(uint256,address).notice: Allows user to open an account for another user by transferring subAccount NFT.

deregisterSessionKey(address).notice: Allows owner to deregister a session key.

registerSessionKey(address,uint256).notice: Allows owners to a register session key to authorize actions for deposited subAccounts.

requestWithdrawAccount(uint256).notice: Activates the cooldown period to withdraw account.

sessionKeys(address,address).notice: Allows other addresses to trade on behalf of users
